methods.name: getExperienceAmount
javadoc: Returns the total amount of XP stored in all of the input slots of this container. The return value is randomized, so that it returns between 50% and 100% of the total XP.

methods.name: getExperienceFromItem
javadoc: Returns the total amount of XP stored in the enchantments of this stack.

methods.name: mayPlace
javadoc: Check if the stack is allowed to be placed in this slot, used for armor slots as well as furnace fuel.
